title: Support long paths (>MAX_PATH)
body:
Please support long paths (>MAX_PATH) - robocopy supports that, the Windows API supports that (=> "\\.\").
Right now I have to use subst to shorten the path, which is a real pain.

comments.body: must for Windows Explorer. This is an issue for us because paths in sharepoint libraries are longer. When sync'ing those libraries with Onedrive users can't open all files.
And in Windows Explorer you cannot delete long paths.... not nice
